import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Header from './components/Header'; import Navigation from './components/Navigation'; import HeroSection from './components/HeroSection'; import PaymentSection from './components/PaymentSection'; import Footer from './components/Footer'; function App() { const paymentMethods = [ { id: 'zelle', title: 'Zelle Payment', icon: 'üí≥', instructions: `Step 1: Open your banking app or Zelle app Step 2: Select "Send Money" or "Send with Zelle" Step 3: Enter our email: info@mc-movers.com Step 4: Enter the deposit amount Step 5: Add a note: "Moving Deposit - [Your Name]" Step 6: Review and send the payment Step 7: Keep the confirmation number for your records Note: Zelle payments are instant and secure. Make sure to use the exact email address provided.` }, { id: 'check', title: 'Paper Check Payment', icon: 'üìÑ', instructions: `Step 1: Make check payable to "MC Movers" Step 2: Write the deposit amount in numbers and words Step 3: Include your full name and moving date in memo Step 4: Mail to: MC Movers, 123 Business St, City, State 12345 Step 5: Or hand deliver to our office during business hours Step 6: Allow 3-5 business days for processing Step 7: Keep a copy of the check for your records Note: Please include your contact information and moving details with the check.` }, { id: 'venmo', title: 'Venmo Payment', icon: 'üì±', instructions: `Step 1: Open the Venmo app on your phone Step 2: Tap "Pay or Request" at the bottom Step 3: Search for @MC-Movers-Official Step 4: Enter the deposit amount Step 5: Add a note: "Moving Deposit - [Your Name]" Step 6: Select "Pay" and confirm Step 7: Take a screenshot of the confirmation Note: Make sure to use our official Venmo handle. Double-check the spelling before sending.` }, { id: 'cashapp', title: 'Cash App Payment', icon: 'üí∞', instructions: `Step 1: Open Cash App on your phone Step 2: Tap the "$" icon at the bottom Step 3: Enter the deposit amount Step 4: Tap "Pay" Step 5: Enter our $Cashtag: $MCMoversOfficial Step 6: Add a note: "Moving Deposit - [Your Name]" Step 7: Tap "Pay" and confirm the transaction Note: Verify our $Cashtag is correct before sending. Keep the transaction receipt.` }, { id: 'terms', title: 'Terms and Conditions', icon: 'üìã', instructions: `Important Documents for Your Move: üìã BILL OF LADING (BOL) - Your official contract for the move - Lists all items being transported - Must be signed before loading begins - Keep your copy throughout the move üìÑ HOUSEHOLD GOODS CONTRACT - Detailed terms and conditions - Insurance coverage information - Claims process and procedures - Your rights and responsibilities üìù TERMS AND CONDITIONS - Payment terms and deadlines - Cancellation policy - Additional charges and fees - Dispute resolution process Contact us at (800) 807-2173 for any questions about these documents.` }, { id: 'auto', title: 'Auto Transport Deposits', icon: 'üöó', instructions: `Step 1: Contact us at 844-396-6839 to schedule Step 2: Provide vehicle details (make, model, year, VIN) Step 3: Get your quote and deposit amount Step 4: Choose your preferred payment method above Step 5: Include "Auto Transport" in payment notes Step 6: We'll confirm your pickup date and time Step 7: Prepare your vehicle (remove personal items, check fluids) Note: Auto transport deposits are typically 50% of total cost. Balance due upon delivery.` } ]; return (
{paymentMethods.map((method) => ( ))}
); } export default App;
